title: Savage.Resurrection-PLAZA
description:
Savage Resurrection (c) S2 Games, LLC

Release Date: 08/2016 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

The rebirth of the classic action FPS / RTS hybrid "Savage 1" is
here! Experience fast-paced combat and cunning strategic gameplay in
glorious Unreal 4 environments. Engage in epic 16v16 front-line
combat, or take Command to outplay and outmaneuver your team's way
to victory. Savage is a multiplayer-only game with a competitive
focus. Combat includes both melee and shooter aspects, and should
challenge even seasoned gamers

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/366440/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play Practice mode offline with bots!
